Variable.Name: User Range Values
Variable.Description: Values measured for trim by user [0]-lower, [1]-upper

Variable.Name: Device Range Values
Variable.Description: Values measured for trim by device [0]-lower, [1]-upper

Variable.Name: User Trim Tag
Variable.Description: A tag of user trim calibrations. Must match for I/O channels which must be synchronous

Variable.Name: confDirectionFlag
Variable.Description: Direction flag that determines loop current change vs. position change.
